domain_yml:
version: '3.1'
intents:
- saludo:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- preguntar_como_estas:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- responder_como_estoy:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- responder_estoy_bien:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- despedida:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- pedir_chiste:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- reirse_chiste:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- buscar_producto:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- buscar_oferta:
    is_starter: true
    use_entities: true
- completar_pedido:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- afirmar:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- denegar:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- agradecimiento:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
- off_topic:
    follow_up_only: true
    use_entities: true
entities:
- producto
- proveedor
- categoria
- ingrediente_activo
- compuesto
- dosis
- cantidad
- sentimiento_positivo
- sentimiento_negativo
- rechazo_total
- intencion_buscar
- solicitud_ayuda
slots:
  producto:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: producto
  proveedor:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: proveedor
  categoria:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: categoria
  ingrediente_activo:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: ingrediente_activo
  compuesto:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: compuesto
    - type: from_entity
      entity: ingrediente_activo
  dosis:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: dosis
  cantidad:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: cantidad
  sentimiento_positivo:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: sentimiento_positivo
  sentimiento_negativo:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: sentimiento_negativo
  rechazo_total:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: rechazo_total
  intencion_buscar:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: intencion_buscar
  solicitud_ayuda:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: from_entity
      entity: solicitud_ayuda
  user_sentiment:
    type: categorical
    values:
    - positive
    - negative
    - neutral
    - rejection
    initial_value: neutral
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  last_intent_flow:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  pending_search_data:
    type: any
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  search_history:
    type: list
    initial_value: []
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  context_decision_pending:
    type: any
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  user_engagement_level:
    type: categorical
    values:
    - neutral
    - engaged
    - needs_help
    - confused
    - friendly
    - collaborative
    - reset
    - disengaged
    - interested
    - needs_guidance
    - satisfied
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  pedido_incompleto:
    type: bool
    initial_value: false
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  conversation_started:
    type: bool
    initial_value: false
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  awaiting_completion:
    type: bool
    initial_value: false
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  last_completed_action:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  conversation_turn:
    type: float
    initial_value: 0
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  pending_suggestion:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
  suggestion_context:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
    mappings:
    - type: custom
responses:
  utter_saludo:
  - text: ¬°Hola! üê∂
  - text: Buenas, un gusto saludarte üêæ
  - text: ¬°Hola! Encantado de verte por ac√° üêæ
  utter_responder_como_estoy:
  - text: Espectacular, gracias por preguntar!
  - text: Muy bien, preparado para asistirte!
  - text: Guau! Me alegro üê∂
  - text: ¬°Sigue as√≠! üí™
  - text: ¬°Eres un campe√≥n! üèÜ
  utter_reirse_chiste:
  - text: üòÑ Me alegra que te haya sacado una sonrisa
  - text: üòÇ jajaja, buen√≠simo
  utter_preguntar_como_estas:
  - text: ¬°...
stories_yml:
version: '3.1'
stories:
- story: story_buscar_oferta_happy_1
  steps:
  - &id001
    intent: buscar_oferta
  - &id002
    action: action_busqueda_situacion
- story: story_buscar_oferta_happy_2
  steps:
  - *id001
  - *id002
  - intent: afirmar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- story: story_buscar_oferta_interrupt_3
  steps:
  - *id001
  - *id002
  - intent: denegar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- story: story_buscar_oferta_interrupt_4
  steps:
  - &id003
    intent: buscar_oferta
  - &id004
    action: action_busqueda_situacion
  - intent: despedida
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- story: story_buscar_oferta_interrupt_5
  steps:
  - *id003
  - *id004
  - intent: agradecimiento
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- story: story_buscar_oferta_interrupt_6
  steps:
  - *id003
  - *id004
  - intent: denegar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- story: story_buscar_oferta_interrupt_7
  steps:
  - *id003
  - *id004
  - intent: off_topic
  - action: action_fallback
- story: story_buscar_producto_happy_1
  steps:
  - &id005
    intent: buscar_producto
  - &id006
    action: action_busqueda_situacion
- story: story_buscar_producto_happy_2

  - intent: agradecimiento

- story: story_despedida_interrupt_3
  steps:

  - *id010
  - intent: denegar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- story: story_despedida_interrupt_4
  steps:

rules_yml:
version: '3.1'
rules:
- rule: rule_saludo
  steps:
  - intent: saludo
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_preguntar_como_estas
  steps:
  - intent: preguntar_como_estas
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_responder_como_estoy
  steps:
  - intent: responder_como_estoy
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_responder_estoy_bien
  steps:
  - intent: responder_estoy_bien
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_despedida
  steps:
  - intent: despedida
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_pedir_chiste
  steps:
  - intent: pedir_chiste
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_reirse_chiste
  steps:
  - intent: reirse_chiste
  - action: action_smalltalk_situacion
- rule: rule_buscar_producto
  steps:
  - intent: buscar_producto
  - action: action_busqueda_situacion
- rule: rule_buscar_oferta
  steps:
  - intent: buscar_oferta
  - action: action_busqueda_situacion
- rule: rule_completar_pedido
  steps:
  - intent: completar_pedido
  - action: action_busqueda_situacion
- rule: rule_afirmar
  steps:
  - intent: afirmar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- rule: rule_denegar
  steps:
  - intent: denegar
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- rule: rule_agradecimiento
  steps:
  - intent: agradecimiento
  - action: action_conf_neg_agradecer
- rule: rule_off_topic
  steps:
  - intent: off_topic
  - action: action_fallback
